"Hilda":
"Was that an Automata just now...?
No, it feels different. It can't be,
But then...what is it...?"
"An Unknown that we've got no data on...Even though it's crossed over the boundaries? ...Hah, there's no way."

"...We need more detailed intel on it.
Head back and write a report on it. "

"今のは機甲種……？
いや、反応が異なる。違うな。
では、これは何だというのだ……？"

"データが存在しないアンノウン……
境界でも越えて来た、とでも？
……はっ、まさかな。"

"……詳しい情報が必要だ。
帰還し、報告を行え。 "
